## RawTermsFacet.order property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

How pertinent is the facet compared to the other facets in the response. If only one facet could be displayed, it should be the one with the highest order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
order?: number;
```
